label: Convert Audio
info:
Convert audio using ffmpeg, creating a simple page to play and download the converted recordings

## Requirements

* [node-red-contrib-browser-utils](https://flows.nodered.org/node/node-red-contrib-browser-utils)
* [node-red-contrib-media-utils](https://flows.nodered.org/node/node-red-contrib-media-utils)
